Macros

macro genXmlLoader(obj: typedesc; target, stream, tag: untyped;
                   newObjExpr: untyped = nil; loadHeader: static[bool] = true;
                   extraFieldLoad: untyped = nil; skipFieldLoad: untyped = [""];
                   extraAttrLoad: untyped = nil): untyped
  • @arg{loadHeader} :: Generate code to load object start (<tag), kind fields and fields marked with .Attr.. Can be turned off to manually process input attributes and then generate remaining boilerplate. NOTE: setting to true implies that @arg{target} object would be created externally, and @arg{newObjExpr} is ignored in that case.
  • @arg{extraFieldLoad} :: Additional field handlers for object. Passed AST must be either nil, or follow pattern @patt{Curly[all ExprColonExpr[@name, @loader]]}
  • @inject{} :: Identifiers for all kind fields - they can be used in @arg{newObjExpr}
  Source   Edit
